about_the_game:
Onikura is a 2D Plataformer Boss-Rush game focused on giving the player freedom to play and advance with their own style, giving you varied options to improve your character and unique abilities that completely change your play style. With unique scenarios and soundtracks, it has very challenging combat and boss fights that will stay with you forever.

• A Hollow Knight-style Combat

Parry, slash, heal, specials and more in a Hollow Knight-style combat with difficult and breathtaking boss fights, customizing your path during the journey.

• Story

As Japan's last hope, defeat all the Onis with the power you possess and seal their souls in the great sacred tree to bring about an era of peace once more.

Absorb the souls of your enemies and use their powers to eliminate each one of them until you reach the Oni God!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 or AMD Phenom II X2 550
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 260 or Radeon HD 4850
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews:
“É como se Hollow Knight e Celeste tivessem um filho: jogo brasileiro Onikura encanta com visuais e precisa estar no seu radar. Quando você mistura características marcantes de indies incríveis, não tem como o resultado decepcionar.”
IGN Brasil
short_description: A frantic and challenging boss rush with options to customize your play style as you progress. Defeat all enemies in your path with attacks, specials, parries, and unique abilities.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
